nodes.text: The Mandalorian covert was a hidden location in the sewers of Nevarro operated by the Tribe. It was a place where Mandalorians could remain in secret, and preserve their creed and way of life.

The covert was the home of Mandalorian bounty hunter Din Djarin after the fall of the Galactic Empire. He visited an armorer there, who made him a pauldron and later a full cuirass from beskar steel he provided.
According to Paz Vizsla, the Tribe were only allowed out of the enclave one at a time.
The covert was left abandoned following the massacre of the Tribe members.
